title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.28 - DO NOT PASS Sign (R4-1)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.28 - DO NOT PASS Sign (R4-1)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 02A The DO NOT PASS (R4-1) sign shall be used only with
standard pavement markings. Option: 02B The DO NOT PASS (R4-1) sign may be used without
pavement markings in work zones. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
